about_the_game:
Free Prosthetic Customization

In Descent X, you'll experience unparalleled freedom in customizing your gear. The free demo alone offers over 50 types of prosthetics with diverse functionalities for you to discover and use. These prosthetics not only grant you formidable power but also introduce endless possibilities for combination. Pair bullet split with explosive effects, or combine homing bullets with penetration—every experiment can lead to a brand-new combat style. Through continuous exploration and experimentation, find the perfect equipment setup that suits you best and enjoy the exhilarating experience where 1+1>2. Each battle is a test of strategy and creativity, turning you into a true tactical master.

Exploring a Pixelated Sci-Fi World

Descent X immerses you in a world filled with randomness, blending retro pixel art with futuristic technology. Awaken in a space station's shelter, surrounded by bizarre creatures and crumbling cityscapes. Every corner here hides secrets waiting to be uncovered. Descend from the space elevator back to Earth, and as you delve deeper into exploration, gradually unravel the truth behind this world. Choose your path based on personal preference, carefully selecting which door leads to the next area. Be prepared; your enemies will also wield powerful gadgets!

A Variety of Enemies

In this enigmatic pixelated sci-fi world, each level is teeming with all sorts of adversaries. From mutated humans and rebellious machines to eerie creatures and gooey slimes, every enemy boasts unique designs and behavior patterns. Their randomly equipped prosthetics add an element of unpredictability to battles, making each encounter fresh and exciting. Carefully designed bosses possess formidable attack power and distinct challenge mechanics. Observe, learn, and adapt to enemy movements, using your wit and skill to overcome obstacles and prove yourself as a top-tier warrior.

Join our Discord!

short_description: Descent X is a top-down bullet shooter that focuses on maneuvering and prop stacking. In this cyberworld full of enemies, use your imagination and creativity to match a variety of combat styles and define a game experience that is uniquely yours! The demo includes all the content of the first level
